user_pass_text.en: A service has requested you to authenticate yourself. Please enter your username and password in the form below.

help_header.en: Help! I don't remember my password.

help_text.en: Too bad! - Without your username and password you cannot authenticate yourself for access to the service. There may be someone that can help you. Consult the help desk at your university!

error_nopassword.en: You sent something to the login page, but for some reason the password was not sent. Try again please.

change_home_org_text.en: You have chosen %HOMEORG% as your home organization. If this is wrong you may choose another one.

email_empty.en: You have not entered your username

otp_empty.en: You have not entered the OTP

password_empty.en: You have not entered your password

qr_code_click_here.en: Click here to enter OTP code manually

sms_otp_empty.en: You have not entered the passcode

sms_otp_send_to.en: We will send you a push or text message with a passcode to destphone. This passcode is valid for the next timeout.

subtitle1.en: 1. Enter your email address and password.

subtitle2.en: 2. Choose your authentication method to complete the login.

subtitle3.en: 3. Multi-step verification requires you to verify your identity using one of the following authentication methods.

subtitle3_2.en: 3. Multi-step verification requires you to verify your identity with another authentication method. Please contact administrator for assistance.
